Method Detail







getOrderFromDatabase


public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getOrderFromDatabase(java.lang.String confirmationID)




Using a confirmation ID calls on the database and retrieves the order specific to that ID.





Parameters:
confirmationID - The confirmation ID for a specific order.

Returns:
Returns a ArrayList the specifics of the order if successful. If unsuccessful it returns NULL.










addOrderToDatabase


public void addOrderToDatabase(java.lang.String confID,
                               java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                               java.lang.String street,
                               java.lang.String city,
                               java.lang.String state,
                               java.lang.String zipCode,
                               java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String paymentType,
                               java.lang.String creditCard,
                               java.lang.String discountCode,
                               Order myOrder)




Adds a specific order to a database. Takes the parameters, creates an instance of CreateNewOrder which it then excecutes.





Parameters:
confID - Confirmation ID for the Order.
phoneNumber - Phone Number for the Order.
street - Street Line of the addres for the Order.
city - City for the address for the Order.
state - State for the address for the Order.
zipCode - ZIP code for the address for the Order.
email - Email for the Order.
paymentType - Payment Type for the Order.
creditCard - Credit Card for the Order.
discountCode - Discount Code for the Order.
myOrder - The final Price.










editOrderInDatabase


public void editOrderInDatabase(java.lang.String confID,
                                java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                java.lang.String street,
                                java.lang.String city,
                                java.lang.String state,
                                java.lang.String zipCode,
                                java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String paymentType,
                                java.lang.String creditCard,
                                java.lang.String discountCode,
                                Order myOrder)




Takes the elements of a Order, creates an instance of CreateNewOrder and then executes.





Parameters:
confID - Confirmation ID for the Order.
phoneNumber - Phone Number for the Order.
street - Street Line of the addres for the Order.
city - City for the address for the Order.
state - State for the address for the Order.
zipCode - ZIP code for the address for the Order.
email - Email for the Order.
paymentType - Payment Type for the Order.
creditCard - Credit Card for the Order.
discountCode - Discount Code for the Order.
myOrder - The final Price for the Order.










addReviewToDatabase


public void addReviewToDatabase(java.lang.String pizzaType,
                                java.lang.Double pizzaRating,
                                java.lang.String comment)




This method takes the pizza type, rating, and comment then creates an instance of CreateNewReview then executes.





Parameters:
pizzaType - Type of pizza
pizzaRating - Rating given for the pizza.
comment - Comment made for the pizza.










getAllReviewsFromDatabase


public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getAllReviewsFromDatabase()




Simple method which retrieves all reviews from the database.






Returns:
Returns a ArrayList of Reviews if successful, NULL if unsuccessful.










convertOrderFromDatabase


public Order convertOrderFromDatabase(java.lang.String fullOrder)




This method takes the full string of an order and divides it into the necessary categories, Pizza and Pop.





Parameters:
fullOrder - The complete order in one string.

Returns:
Returns an Order where pizza and pop are in seperate objects.










convertOrderToDatabase


public java.lang.String convertOrderToDatabase(Order fullOrder)




Method converts an order in order for it to be properly sent to the database.





Parameters:
fullOrder - Takes the original Order.

Returns:
A string with breaks specified.
